data.comment: The first-half is just kicking off.
Hiroshima push forward at Nissan Stadium and Leandro Pereira gets in a great header. The attempt is cleared by the Yokohama Marinos defence.
In the minute 1, In Yokohama a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Ball goes out of play for a Hiroshima goal kick.
Yokohama Marinos awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 3, Hiroshima awarded a free kick in their own half.
Ball safe as Yokohama Marinos is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Minami Tojo signals a free kick to Hiroshima.
In the minute 4, Hiroshima drive forward but Yoshifumi Kashiwa is judged offside.
Free kick for Hiroshima in the half of Yokohama Marinos.
Throw-in for Hiroshima in the half of Yokohama Marinos.
In the minute 6, Minami Tojo awards the home team a throw-in.
Throw-in Yokohama Marinos.
Free kick for Yokohama Marinos in their own half.
In the minute 7, Leandro Pereira for Hiroshima is whistled offside.
Yokohama Marinos advance rapidly upfield but Minami Tojo blows for offside.
In Yokohama Hiroshima attack through Leandro Pereira. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 7, It's a goal kick for the home team in Yokohama.
In Yokohama, Hiroshima push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
Throw-in for Hiroshima at Nissan Stadium.
In the minute 11, Hiroshima's Yuya Asano breaks free at Nissan Stadium. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Yokohama Marinos have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Hiroshima in their own half.
In the minute 12, Minami Tojo signals a free kick to Hiroshima in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Minami Tojo signals a free kick to Hiroshima in their own half.
In the minute 13, Goal kick for Hiroshima at Nissan Stadium.
Throw-in for Yokohama Marinos in their own half.
Hiroshima awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 15, Minami Tojo awards the home team a throw-in.
Hiroshima awarded a free kick in their own half.
Hiroshima are whistled for offside.
In the minute 18, Throw-in for Hiroshima at Nissan Stadium.
Yokohama Marinos to take a throw-in in Hiroshima territory.
Minami Tojo signals a Yokohama Marinos throw-in in Hiroshima's half.
In the minute 19, Can Yokohama Marinos get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Hiroshima's half?
Free kick for Yokohama Marinos in their own half.
Free kick Yokohama Marinos.
In the minute 21, Yokohama Marinos's Marcos Junior gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Minami Tojo awards Hiroshima a goal kick.
Free kick for Yokohama Marinos in their own half.
In the minute 22, Ball safe as Hiroshima is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Minami Tojo awards Yokohama Marinos a goal kick.
Goal kick for Hiroshima at Nissan Stadium.
In the minute 27, Yuya Asano (Hiroshima) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Yokohama.
Hiroshima awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 29, Throw-in Hiroshima.
Can Hiroshima capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Yokohama Marinos's half?
Corner awarded to Hiroshima.
In the minute 31, Hiroshima are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
Minami Tojo signals a free kick to Hiroshima in their own half.
Throw-in for Hiroshima in the half of Yokohama Marinos.
In the minute 33, Yokohama Marinos awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Hiroshima in their own half.
Yuya Asano (Hiroshima) gets up for a header but cannot keep the ball on target.
In the minute 35, Ball goes out of play for a Yokohama Marinos goal kick.
Daizen Maeda for Yokohama Marinos gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Hiroshima have a goal kick.
In the minute 38, Yokohama Marinos needs to be cautious. Hiroshima have an attacking throw-in.
Minami Tojo signals a free kick to Yokohama Marinos.
Hiroshima's Yoshifumi Kashiwa has been booked in Yokohama.
In the minute 39, Can Hiroshima get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Yokohama Marinos's half?
Minami Tojo signals a free kick to Hiroshima in their own half.
Hiroshima drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
In the minute 40, Ball safe as Hiroshima is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick for Hiroshima in the half of Yokohama Marinos.
Hiroshima are coming forward and Leandro Pereira gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 42, Ball goes out of play for a Yokohama Marinos goal kick.
Yokohama Marinos's Junior Santos misses with an attempt on goal.
Minami Tojo awards Hiroshima a goal kick.
In the minute 44, Goal! Marcos Junior gives Yokohama Marinos a 1-0 lead in Yokohama.
That's a fine assist from Junior Santos.
At Nissan Stadium the fourth official shows that 2 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
In the minute 45, Hiroshima are caught offside.
Minami Tojo blows to end the first-half.
Minami Tojo has blown to start the second-half.
Yokohama Marinos awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 46, Throw-in for Yokohama Marinos close to the penalty box.
In the minute 46, The away team replace Yuki Nogami with Hiroya Matsumoto.
Tsukasa Morishima is on a sub for Yuya Asano for Hiroshima.
Marcos Junior (Yokohama Marinos) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Yokohama Marinos have been awarded a corner by Minami Tojo.
In the minute 48, Free kick for Hiroshima in their own half.
Hiroshima's Douglas Vieira breaks free at Nissan Stadium. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Yokohama Marinos have a goal kick.
In the minute 51, Hiroshima have been awarded a corner by Minami Tojo.
Throw-in high up the field for Hiroshima in Yokohama.
Free kick in a good position for Hiroshima!
In the minute 53, Leandro Pereira (Hiroshima) levels the match at 1-1 with a header.
Rhayner with an assist there.
Marcos Junior (Yokohama Marinos) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
In the minute 55, Hiroshima are caught offside.
Minami Tojo signals a Yokohama Marinos throw-in in Hiroshima's half.
Hiroshima will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Yokohama Marinos.
In the minute 59, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Minami Tojo awards the away team a throw-in.
Yokohama Marinos to take a throw-in in Hiroshima territory.
In the minute 60, Goal! A Junior Santos header gives Yokohama Marinos a 2-1 lead in Yokohama.
Theerathon Bunmathan instrumental with a fine assist.
The away team have replaced Rhayner with Hayao Kawabe. This is the third substitution made today by Hiroshi Jofuku.
In the minute 64, Throw-in Yokohama Marinos.
Throw-in for Yokohama Marinos at Nissan Stadium.
Minami Tojo signals a free kick to Hiroshima in their own half.
In the minute 66, Goal kick for Hiroshima at Nissan Stadium.
Throw-in for Yokohama Marinos in their own half.
Yokohama Marinos awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 67, Important block from the Hiroshima defence as Junior Santos fires in a strike for Yokohama Marinos.
Yokohama Marinos have a dangerous throw-in.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Yokohama.
In the minute 69, Yokohama Marinos awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick Yokohama Marinos.
Kota Watanabe is replacing Marcos Junior for the home team.
In the minute 70, Yokohama Marinos make their second substitution with Eitaro Matsuda replacing Teruhito Nakagawa.
Throw-in Hiroshima.
Tomoya Fujii is replacing Yoshifumi Kashiwa for Hiroshima at Nissan Stadium.
In the minute 73, Yokohama Marinos drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
Free kick for Hiroshima in their own half.
Ryuta Koike is booked for the home team.
In the minute 75, Yokohama Marinos to take a throw-in in Hiroshima territory.
Throw-in for Hiroshima in the half of Yokohama Marinos.
At Nissan Stadium, Hiroshima are penalized for being offside.
In the minute 76, Can Yokohama Marinos get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Hiroshima's half?
Ange Postecoglou (Yokohama Marinos) is making a third substitution, with Ryo Takano replacing Daizen Maeda.
Yokohama Marinos make their fourth substitution with Erik replacing Junior Santos.
In the minute 79, Corner awarded to Hiroshima.
Corner awarded to Hiroshima.
In Yokohama a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 80, Sho Sasaki for Hiroshima has been booked by Minami Tojo and receives a first yellow card.
Throw-in for Hiroshima at Nissan Stadium.
Minami Tojo signals a Yokohama Marinos throw-in in Hiroshima's half.
In the minute 82, Throw-in for Hiroshima in their own half.
Minami Tojo signals a free kick to Yokohama Marinos in their own half.
In the minute 83, Ball safe as Yokohama Marinos is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Hiroshi Jofuku is making the team's fifth substitution at Nissan Stadium with Shunki Higashi replacing Hiroya Matsumoto.
Yokohama Marinos are pushing forward but Eitaro Matsuda's finish is wide of the goal.
Minami Tojo awards Hiroshima a goal kick.
In the minute 84, Free kick for Yokohama Marinos in their own half.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Yokohama.
In Yokohama, Douglas Vieira (Hiroshima) gets his head to the ball but the strike is cleared by an untiring defence.
In the minute 86, Hiroshima awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Yokohama Marinos push upfield but Minami Tojo quickly pulls them for offside.
Leandro Pereira (Hiroshima) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 88, Minami Tojo awards the home team a throw-in.
Free kick Yokohama Marinos.
Yokohama Marinos have been awarded a corner by Minami Tojo.
In Yokohama Yokohama Marinos attack through Ryo Takano. The finish is off target, however.
Goal kick for Hiroshima at Nissan Stadium.
The fourth official's board shows 5 minutes, which will be added to the 2nd half.
Hiroshima have a goal kick.
Minami Tojo signals a free kick to Hiroshima.
Ball goes out of play for a Yokohama Marinos goal kick.
Throw-in for Hiroshima at Nissan Stadium.
It's 3-1 as the referee blows for full-time.
Goal! Erik extends Yokohama Marinos's lead to 3-1.
